Title: Taxiwala
Writer: Saikumar Reddy (dialogue), Saikumar Reddy (screenplay), Rahul Sankrityan (story)
Actors: Vijay Deverakonda, Priyanka Jawalkar, Malavika Nair, Ravi Prakash
Plot: Taxiwala is a Telugu movie starring Vijay Deverakonda and Priyanka Jawalkar in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Rahul Sankrityayan.
